issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Make UDFs not need a Field
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9849](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9849). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7967,> shows that it is possible to not require users to pass a `Field` to UDFs declarations and instead just pass a `DataType`.

Let's deprecate Field from them, and instead just use `DataType`.
